author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: An amazing figure that is a highlight of the Captain America archive
review:
Opening;

This was my first taste of Lego marvel magazine, as this figure was the reason I intended to get 76168 as I for some reason never before owned a Captain America minifigure and for my first one, I am very impressed.

The Minifigure-

The helmet was introduced in the atrocious 76123 from 2019 but works great with the side printing, there is also a light nougat superman hair included, his face is determined with a chin strap and another with a grin for the hair piece, the torso is fantastic and has a scaled design with the prominent star in the centre and his legs are just unprinted dark blue. The accessory is the shield in dark grey with fantastic printing.

The build- 

The build included is a stand for the shield and the hair/helmet it is built on a textured 1x2 dark grey brick, with a modified 1x2 plate to attach the shield, a dark blue 1x2 jumper and a black telescope.

In conclusion-

This is a great figure with pointless build, but the figure alone is worth more than the retail price of £4 to me, so I highly recommend this, also the following marvel magazine looks just as good, War Machine from the 76153 Helicarrier with all appropriate accessories.
